Improvements.Improvement: Use final keyword for immutable variables
Improvements.Description: Variables that don't change their reference, like 'tpl', 'errorCodeList', 'apiDocDictList' should be declared with final keyword to improve code clarity and prevent accidental reassignment.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract duplicate code into a method
Improvements.Change_Diff: To be replaced with a call to the new helper method.
Improvements.Description: There is duplicate code for creating new ApiDoc objects. This can be extracted into a helper method.
